definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: E. of Jordan 2Sa 10:16 (Th their army, but LXX SyrVer Targum Ew:Gesch. iii. 211 Anm. 1 = H iii. 155 n. 2 We Dr) = [[חֵלָָא֠מָה]] v:2Sa 10:17 (LXX Ailam); + [[חילם]] Ez Eze 47:16 (LXX Hliam) Co; acc. to this it lay on the border between Damascus and Hamath.
